metadata.title: Dr. Najeeba Arifâ€™s book launch ceremony on Feb 12

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 11 (APP):National Book Foundation (NBP) would organise a launching ceremony of renowned writer and poet Dr. Najeeba Arif's book titled 'Nawah e Kazima' at its Ahmed Faraz Auditorium on February 12 at 3pm. The book Nawah e Kazima is an Urdu translation of Qaseeda Burda Shareef. Literary critic and scholar Professor Fateh Mohammad Malik would chair the launching ceremony. Other speakers, including Rai Riaz Hussain, Dr. Habib-ur-Rehman Asim, Dr. Zia-ul-Haq, Dr. Saira Batool, and Abdullah Naeem would address the event.
